long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
âœ“ Manage shared inboxes like support@ or sales@
âœ“ Organize conversations with shared Gmail labels
âœ“ Collaborate with your team via @mention in email notes
âœ“ Visualize your inboxes as Kanban boards
âœ“ Put repetitive tasks on autopilot with workflow automation
âœ“ Monitor team performance with SLAs and detailed reports
âœ“ and be ensured that Gmelius will keep your teams, your tools and processes in full sync

We integrate with the tools already used by your company. No need to migrate your data nor train your teams on another application.
--

âœ¨ Highest Star Rating in our Class.
ğŸ† Leader of the shared inbox space.

This is our browser extension that completes our solution for Gmail and Google Workspace customers.

ğŸ”„ Unique 2-way Integrations with your teamsâ€™ tools
âœ“ Let your teams get work done from their preferred workspace:

ğŸ› Gmail
âœ“ Shared Inboxes, Shared Labels, Email Notes, Email Automation, Email templates, and more...
âœ“ Use Gmelius features from your email inbox and across all platforms:

ğŸ› Slack
âœ“ Sync your Shared Inboxes and Gmail Labels to Slack channels
âœ“ Manage your inbox activity without leaving Slack:
âœ“ Reply to emails
âœ“ Share & Assign emails
âœ“ Add and Reply to email notes

ğŸ› Trello
âœ“ Integrate your Gmelius boards with Trello
âœ“ Trello board actions will update in real-time with Gmelius
âœ“ Manage your Gmelius boards via the Trello App

ğŸ“±Mobile Apps
âœ“ Gmelius for iOS & Android
âœ“ Real-time syncing across all devices and all team members


Key features:

ğŸ“¨ Shared Inbox
âœ“ Create a shared inbox easily from Gmail
âœ“ Manage group emails like support@, sales@, info@ from Gmail
âœ“ Discover the smartest alternative to Google Groups and help desks
âœ“ Ticketing: open / pending / closed and more

ğŸ·ï¸ Gmail Shared Labels
âœ“ Share existing or new Gmail labels with members of your team
âœ“ Synchronize conversations in real-time across all devices (e.g., mobile, desktop)

ğŸ‘¥ Team Collaboration
âœ“ Real-time syncing across all devices
âœ“ No more bcc nor fwd!
âœ“ Email Notes and @mentions to add context to any conversation
âœ“ Assign or delegate emails to members of your team

 ğŸ§® Kanban Project Boards
âœ“ Turn your shared inbox or label into a project board â€“ bring visibility to your team
âœ“ Manage your columns by team member or status â€“ optimize your teamâ€™s workload
âœ“ Convert emails into task cards for clear visibility
âœ“ Drag and drop cards to assign emails and complete tasks
âœ“ Add due dates, synced 2-way with your Google Calendar â€“ stay up to date everywhere
âœ“ 2-way synchronization with Trello

ğŸ¤“ Workflow Intelligence
âœ“ Automate repetitive tasks with rules for internal and external workflows
âœ“ SLA rules, auto responder, auto assignment and more
âœ“ Ex: â€œwhen this email gets answered add automatically reply and assign it to that team memberâ€

ğŸ¤– Email Automation
âœ“ Personalized email campaigns sent with Mail Merge
âœ“ Automated Email Sequences â€“ put your outreach on autopilot
âœ“ Automated Follow-Ups â€“ youâ€™ll never miss an opportunity
âœ“ â€œIf This - Then Thatâ€ your email flows based on recipient reactions

ğŸ“§ Shareable Email Templates for Gmail
âœ“ Make email writing easy and fast
âœ“ Improve your team's consistency and performance
âœ“ Proposal, Sales, Marketing, Custom Templates - easily created and shared


Keep your remote teams in sync

Gmelius is a great solution to unlock seamless collaboration for remote work. Would you like to learn more? Book a demo: https://gmelius.com/request-demo


Pricing

You can sign up for Gmelius for a 7-day Free Trial right on the app. Then you can choose a plan suited to the needs of your team, from Plus to Pro.
https://gmelius.com/pricing


Privacy and Security

Gmelius is a Switzerland-based company that takes your privacy extremely seriously. We believe you should always know what data we collect from you and how we use it, and that you should have meaningful control over both.

For more details, please see https://gmelius.com/legal/security

---
Copyright Â© Gmelius
Gmail is a registered trademark of Google Inc. Gmelius is not affiliated with Google.

Turn Gmail into a collaboration tool and sync it with your favorite apps like Slack or Trello. 
âœ“ Manage shared inboxes like support@ or sales@
âœ“ Organize conversations with shared Gmail labels
âœ“ Collaborate with your team via @mentioned email notes

âœ“ Put repetitive tasks on autopilot with workflow automation
âœ“ Monitor team performance with SLAs and detailed reports
âœ“ and be ensured that Gmelius will keep your teams, your tools and processes in full sync 
 
We integrate with the tools already used by your company. No need to migrate your data nor train your teams on another application.
 
Gmelius simplifies teamwork, try us!
 
--

 ğŸ† Leader of the shared inbox space.

âœ“ Share existing or new Gmail labels with members of your team

ğŸ‘¥ Team Collaboration

 ğŸ§® Kanban Project Boards

âœ“ Drag and drop cards to assign emails and complete tasks

Keep your remote teams in sync

Gmelius is a great solution to unlock seamless collaboration for remote work. Would you like to learn more? Book a demo: https://gmelius.com/#demo 


Pricing
